title: Infant and Juvenile Mortality Analysis
alt: Infant and Juvenile Mortality Analysis thumbnail
summary: A Survival analysis of infant and juvenile mortality using a fertility survey dataset. This project employs Kaplan-Meier curves and Cox Proportional Hazards models in R to identify key demographic and socio-economic factors influencing child survival.

title: Changes in Fine Particulate Matter (PM2.5) Levels in the United States: A Case Study of 1999 vs 2012
summary: A draft scientific manuscript analyzing national PM2.5 trends in the United States (1999â€“2012), prepared in Overleaf and exported to PDF.

title: Framingham Heart Study: Cardiovascular Risk Trajectory and Survival Analysis
summary: Complete-case analysis of the Framingham cohort using mixed models for SYSBP/TOTCHOL trajectories and survival analysis for stroke/CHD risk.

title: Nobel Prize Winners Analysis
alt: Nobel Prize winners data analysis thumbnail
summary: Exploratory data analysis of Nobel laureates from 1901 to 2023, focusing on temporal patterns, category distributions, and trends across decades, using R for data wrangling and ggplot2 for visualization.
